channel.title: La Grande - Baker Highway on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in La Grande - Baker Highway on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: River Lane East at US-30 East And Approaching I-84
item.description: River Lane East at US-30 East to Haines. Approaching onramp for I-84. Use I-84 east to Baker City; I-84 West/US-30 West for La Grande. OR-237 North begins at the I-84 interchange. Use OR-237 for North Powder.

item.title: US-30 West at Anthony Lakes Jct. and I-84
item.description: US-30 West at Anthony Lakes Jct. and I-84. Turn left for Anthony Lakes (Ski Area). Turn right for North Powder I-84/US-30 west to La Grande.

item.title: US-30 West - Baker City
item.description: US-30 west in Baker City (Broadway St. at 10th St.). Turn right on 10th St. to continue west on US-30 and for I-84, North Baker Business District, Haines, and Anthony Lakes.

item.title: US-30 East - La Grande
item.description: Entering La Grande on US-30 east. La Grande is the county seat of Union County and home to Eastern Oregon University.

item.title: OR-7 West Approaching OR-245
item.description: OR-7 West approaching OR-245 in Baker County. Use OR-245 west for Unity.

item.title: US-30 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-30 east. Distance to Huntington and Ontario.

item.title: US-30 West at OR-7 - Baker City
item.description: US-30 West/OR-7 east in Baker City. Turn right for US-30 East/OR-7 South to Ontario and John Day. Turn left for OR-7 west to Richland and Hells Canyon (via OR-86).

item.title: US-30 East Approaching OR-7
item.description: US-30 east approaching OR-7. Use left lane for Richland and Halfway. Both of these communities are along OR-86 between Baker City and Hells Canyon.

item.title: US-30 East - Baker City
item.description: US-30 east along Broadway in Baker City.

item.title: End OR-203 North at I-84/US-30
item.description: End OR-203 north at I-84/US-30. Turn left for I-84 west; continue under freeway for I-84 east.

item.title: End OR-203 at I-84/US-30
item.description: End OR-203 at I-84/US-30 junction. Turn left for I-84 west to Pendleton; continue straight for I-84 east, and US-30 west to La Grande.

item.title: OR-203 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on OR-203 north to La Grande.

item.title: OR-203/OR-237 North at OR-203/OR-237 Split
item.description: OR-203/OR-237 North at OR-203/OR-237 Split. Turn right for OR-237 north to Cove; turn left for OR-203 north to Hot Lake and La Grande.

item.title: OR-237/OR-203 North Approaching OR-237
item.description: OR-237/OR-203 North approaching OR-237 north to Cove.

item.title: OR-237 North at OR-203 South
item.description: OR-237 north at OR-203 south in Union. Use OR-203 south for Catherine Creek State Park and Medical Springs. OR-203 joins OR-237 north through Union.

item.title: OR-237 North Approaching OR-203
item.description: OR-237 north approaching OR-203 to Catherine Creek State Park and Medical Springs.

item.title: OR-237 North - Entering Union
item.description: Entering Union, Oregon on OR-237 north.

item.title: OR-237 North - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on OR-237 north. Distance to Union and Cove.

item.title: US-30 West at I-84 and OR-237
item.description: US-30 west at I-84 and OR-237. US-30 joins I-84 west to La Grande. Continue straight for OR-237 and North Powder.

item.title: US-30 West at Anthony Lakes Jct. and I-84
item.description: US-30 West at Anthony Lakes Jct. and I-84. Turn left for Anthony Lakes (Ski Area). Turn right for North Powder I-84/US-30 west to La Grande.

item.title: US-30 West - 45th Parallel
item.description: 45th Parallel - Halfway Between Equator and North Pole. Taken on US-30 west between Haines and North Powder.

item.title: US-30 West - Entering Haines
item.description: Entering Haines on US-30 west.

item.title: US-30 West - Anthony Lakes Jct.
item.description: US-30 west approaching Anthony Lakes Junction in Haines. Anthony Lakes is a ski area.

item.title: US-30 East at I-84 (Exit 306)
item.description: US-30 east at I-84 (Exit 306) onramp. US-30 joins I-84 east to Huntington. This is the eastern entrance to Baker City. Use I-84 East/US-30 East for Ontario. Use I-84 West for La Grande.

item.title: US-30 West/OR-7 East Split
item.description: US-30 West/OR-7 east in Baker City. Turn left for US-30 west to North Baker Business District, Haines, and Anthony Lakes. Continue straight for OR-7 east, to I-84, Richland, and La Grande.

item.title: US-30 West to I-84 - Baker City
item.description: US-30 West/(OR-7 East) along Main St. in Baker City. Continue along Main St. for I-84 (via OR-7).

item.title: OR-7 East at US-30
item.description: OR-7 east at US-30 in Baker City. Turn right on US-30 east for Ontario and Huntington. Continue straight on US-30 West/OR-7 East for La Grande and Portland.

item.title: OR-7 East Approaching US-30
item.description: OR-7 east approaching US-30 in Baker City.

item.title: OR-82 West Approaching US-30
item.description: OR-82 West approaching US-30 and (La Grande) City Center. The overhead sign is attached to the Union Pacific Railroad overpass.

item.title: I-84 East - Exit 259
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 259 - US-30/La Grande. Overhead for I-84 to Baker City and Ontario.

item.title: I-84 East Exit 265
item.description: I-84 east at Exit 265, OR-203/La Grande/Union.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 265
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 265, US-30/OR-203/La Grande/Union

item.title: I-84 West Exit 285
item.description: I-84 west approaching Exit 285, OR-237/North Powder/Union, 1 mile.

item.title: I-84 West Exit 306
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 306, US-30 West/Baker City/Haines.
